definition: to support/frame/rack/framework/classifier for planes, large vehicles, radios etc

sentences.english: In the street, a cluster of fights happened, but no one came to stop it…
sentences.chinese: 在街上，有打群架的事发生，但没有一个人出来阻止。

sentences.english: The boy justified himself by saying he did not begin the fight.
sentences.chinese: 他每逢碰到打群架都要参加。

sentences.english: He was scolded for aiding and abetting those boys who were fighting.
sentences.chinese: 他因为教唆这些打群架的孩子而受到责备。

definition: to fight/to scuffle/to come to blows/CL:場|场[chang2]
(dialect) to come to blows/to have a row
to have a fist fight/fist fight/brawl
to spar/to fight/to duke it out
to mediate in a quarrel/to intervene in a dispute and try to calm things down
chaotic warfare/confused fighting/melee/to join in such fighting
to try to stop a fight/to intervene in a fight
